attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ban gang membership full stop.politicians should have done this already.those in so called street gangs who murder should surely face the death penalty which should be reintroduced to act as the deterrence that there is not at present.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/life-for-a-life/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
